dmca.title: FW: [EV1-C2393966Y] http://www.k9training.info - plagiarism report
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: John Ogden [mailto:johnpaidtosurf@googlemail.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, January 03, 2007 4:46 PM
To: Copyright
Subject: Re: FW: [EV1-C2393966Y] http://www.k9training.info - plagiarism
report


You have infringed my copyright - end of story.  I suggest you make a
proer response to my complaint.




On 03/01/07, Copyright < copyright@theplanet.com
<mailto:copyright@theplanet.com> > wrote: 

        To Whom It May Concern:
        
        Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice
does not

the

your
        claim. 
        
        Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
        
        Legal Response Team
        THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

        Subject: http://www.k9training.info - plagiarism report
        MIME-Version: 1.0

                boundary="----=_Part_106980_10003687.1167742009119"
        X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net
        X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00
        X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of
        TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED
        Return-Path: johnpaidtosurf@googlemail.com
        X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 Jan 2007 12:46:49.0912 (UTC)
        FILETIME=[12252B80:01C72E6C]
        
        (multipart/alternative)
        MIME element (text/plain)
        I have discovered that the authors of k9training.info are
reproducing
        all my blog material <http://top-dog-tips.blogspot.com> at their
blog on
        http://www.k9training.info/blog but they are listing themsselves
as the
        originators of the material and failing to acknowledge my
intellectual
        property.  On a whois search this site appears to be hosted on
your
        servers at
        
        ns 9.webadminonline.com ns10.webadminonline.com  domain:
69.57.150.97
        <
http://www.completewhois.com/cgi-bin/whois.cgi?query=69.57.150.97
<http://www.completewhois.com/cgi-bin/whois.cgi?query=69.57.150.97> >
        
        I am determined to stop this plagiarism so if you are the
webhosts, then
        you need to ensure that your client removes my posts from the
blog.  If 
        you are not the web hosts then please let me have full details
so that i
        can contact them.
        The email address shown on the website,
questions@k9training.info, is
        not accepting messages.
        
        regards
        John Ogden
        
        
        ---------- Forwarded message ----------
        From: John Ogden <johnpaidtosurf@googlemail.com>
        Date: 27-Dec-2006 21:54 
        Subject: Re: PLAGIARISM - STOP COPYING MY BLOG
        To: questions@k9training.info, jeff@sandiegowebdesigns.com
        
        
        
        On 27/12/06, John Ogden <johnpaidtosurf@googlemail.com> wrote: I
        discovered your blatant stealing of my blog material for your
blog on
        http://www.k9training.info/blog and I require that you cease and
desist
        immediately or I will contact your web host to get you closed
down.  If
        you want to reproduce my blog posts then you must credit me and
provide 
        me with a link back.  Otherwise remove all exisiting copied
posts and
        cease from plagiarising my material.
